name: The King of the Oceans
description:
Solomon the salmon take his first adventure in the deep blue ocean. The poor young salmon have to struggle his life to eat and grow bigger in the ocean full of dangers. He better watch out for the bigger fish that try to feed on him in the bittersweet place called "Ocean". Unfortunately, life is not that easy in any case, it's the world where the weak cannot, and the strong thrive.

Solomon must find the way for him to grow stronger and dominate the ocean to survive its cruelty. Only his ability "the bubbles" which can kill other fish nearby may save his life during the worse case that could happen to him. Could you help Solomon fill his belly to grow big and strong?

Features:

  • Old style pixel graphic
  • Beautiful ocean life
  • Explore the ocean
  • Unpredictable event
  • Hidden mystery
  • More than just eat and grow

Warning: This game is not for who are easily disturbed.
